abstract: Former Las Vegas pet shop owner Gloria Lee is sentenced to 5 to 14 years in state prison after pleading guilty to arson and attempted animal cruelty charges; Lee set fire to her store, which housed dozens of puppies and dogs, in 2014.
lead_paragraph: A former Las Vegas pet shop owner was sentenced Wednesday to 5 to 14 years in state prison for setting fire to the business where 27 puppies and dogs were rescued last year.

headline.main: Nevada: Woman Gets Prison Term for Arson at Her Pet Shop
headline.print_headline: Nevada: Woman Gets Prison Term for Arson at Her Pet Shop

snippet: A former Las Vegas pet shop owner was sentenced Wednesday to 5 to 14 years in state prison for setting fire to the business where 27 puppies and dogs were rescued last year.
